end_time.description: End time (RFC3339, optional, auto-derived by default)

metrics.description: Analysis metrics list, empty or missing means all

start_time.description: Start time (RFC3339, optional, auto-derived by default)

metrics.description: List of metrics analyzed in this task

address_ids.description: List of address IDs to be deleted

details.description: Event details (structured JSON, no plain text)

data.description: Event data (varies by type, see schema above)
